mapper.select: SELECT b.*, s.subject_name, i.item_name FROM budget b LEFT JOIN budget_subject s ON b.subject_id = s.subject_id LEFT JOIN budget_item i ON b.item_id = i.item_id WHERE b.budget_id = #{id}
SELECT b.*, s.subject_name, i.item_name FROM budget b LEFT JOIN budget_subject s ON b.subject_id = s.subject_id LEFT JOIN budget_item i ON b.item_id = i.item_id WHERE b.budget_no = #{no}

SELECT b.*, s.subject_name, i.item_name FROM budget b LEFT JOIN budget_subject s ON b.subject_id = s.subject_id LEFT JOIN budget_item i ON b.item_id = i.item_id ORDER BY b.budget_year DESC, b.budget_no

SELECT b.*, s.subject_name, i.item_name FROM budget b LEFT JOIN budget_subject s ON b.subject_id = s.subject_id LEFT JOIN budget_item i ON b.item_id = i.item_id WHERE b.budget_year = #{year} ORDER BY b.budget_no

SELECT b.*, s.subject_name, i.item_name FROM budget b LEFT JOIN budget_subject s ON b.subject_id = s.subject_id LEFT JOIN budget_item i ON b.item_id = i.item_id WHERE b.item_id = #{itemId} ORDER BY b.budget_year DESC, b.budget_no

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget (budget_no, budget_name, budget_year, budget_period, subject_id, subject_code, item_id, item_code, budget_amount, occupied_amount, executed_amount, remaining_amount, execution_rate, status, process_definition_id, process_instance_id, create_user) VALUES (#{budgetNo}, #{budgetName}, #{budgetYear}, #{budgetPeriod}, #{subjectId}, #{subjectCode}, #{itemId}, #{itemCode}, #{budgetAmount}, #{occupiedAmount}, #{executedAmount}, #{remainingAmount}, #{executionRate}, #{status}, #{processDefinitionId}, #{processInstanceId}, #{createUser})
mapper.update: UPDATE budget SET executed_amount = executed_amount + #{amount}, remaining_amount = budget_amount - occupied_amount - (executed_amount + #{amount}), execution_rate = ((executed_amount + #{amount}) / budget_amount) * 100 WHERE budget_id = #{id}
